body:
I am adding Chombo package.

It has logic to manage fortran name mangling but requires the makefile variables to be set up appropriately. Does spack know the fortran name mangling? I suppose I can have my edit phase do a fortran compile of a hello world program and then query name mangling from that. Anyone have any better ideas?
title: Have a MakefilePackage that wants to be told what fortran name mangling is
